doctor.name: Prof. Dr. Md. Latifur Rahman Apu
doctor.specialty: Anesthesiology, Pain Management & Critical Care Medicine Specialist
doctor.info: Prof. Dr. Md. Latifur Rahman Apu is a Anesthesiologist in Rajshahi. His qualification is MBBS, MD (Anesthesiology). He is a Professor & Head, Anesthesiology at Rajshahi Medical College & Hospital. He regularly provides treatment to his patients at Amana Hospital, Rajshahi. Practicing hour of Prof. Dr. Md. Latifur Rahman Apu at Amana Hospital, Rajshahi is Unknown. Please call to know visiting hour.

chamber.visitingTime: Unknown. Please call to know visiting hour

doctor.name: Dr. Md. Khizir Hossain
doctor.info: Dr. Md. Khizir Hossain is a Pain Medicine Specialist in Rajshahi. His qualification is MBBS, BCS (Health), DA, FIPM, CCD (BIRDEM). He is a Consultant at Rajshahi Medical College & Hospital. He regularly provides treatment to his patients at Popular Diagnostic Center, Rajshahi. Practicing hour of Dr. Md. Khizir Hossain at Popular Diagnostic Center, Rajshahi is 3pm to 9pm (Closed: Friday).
